name: Know the Enemy
text: You commune with the divine, reflecting on one type of creature you encountered in the last day. You may make a Knowledge check regarding that creature type with a +10 insight bonus.
mythicText: The insight bonus increases to +15 plus your tier. If the check is successful, you gain a +5 insight bonus on your next attack roll or saving throw against a creature of that type, as long as the roll occurs within 24 hours of casting the spell.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
text_zh: 你请示神谕，回想一个你前一天所遇到的生物类型。在施法完成后，你可以进行一次该生物所属类别的知识检定，并且在检定中获得+10洞察加值。
mythicText_zh: 洞察加值增加至+15点外加你的阶层。若检定成功，你会在自身下一次对抗该类生物的攻击检定或豁免检定中获得+5洞察加值，上述检定必须发生在施放法术后的24小时内。
